GisXmlCopyHandler
Create
Create

static GIS_API GisXmlCopyHandler* GisXmlCopyHandler::Create (  GisXmlWriter *  writer  )  [inline, static]
 

Constructs a Copy Handler. When attached (as the SAX Handler) to a GisXmlReader, this object copies all sub-elements of the current element being parsed.

Parameters:
writer Input the sub-elements are written to this XML writer.
Returns:
Returns GisXmlCopyHandler
